channel.title: Comments for page "The Road to Womanhood"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Road to Womanhood"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: This will give you the bonus for ANY three girls, however since it is +2 streth/range and not +2 all strength/range, it will not affect your dou stats. "All" is the keyword to look for when looking for +dou items (of course there's the dou + dou items, but that's obvious)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Can anyone verify if this also gives the bonuses while doing BurgerNinja/PizzaWitch missions, for the Dou stats?
Like say, any combo of: Karen/Karen Lvl.2, Cici Lvl.2, Nana, Euthanasia, Blondie?
